Name: Incarnate's Anger
Desc:
Gathers fire to unleash the Flame Incarnate. Can only be used when Fires of Creation is summoned, and a different attack is activated based on the type of incarnate summoned. Use with the Down key to activate an attack suitable for an Incarnate that is not currently summoned.
Consumes all flames when used, and the attack is enhanced based on the number of flames consumed. A Fire Element attack.
Does not affect enemies in the Damage Reflection status.
